## Week 1: Web Scraping & Data Collection

**Topics**: Chrome DevTools, Requests + BeautifulSoup, Playwright, pandas visualization

### Lecture (1.5 hours)
- [PDF](week1-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](week1-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/week1-lecture.md)
- Content: DevTools deep dive, HTTP requests, HTML parsing, browser automation

### Lab (3 hours)
- [PDF](week1-lab.pdf) | [HTML](week1-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/week1-lab.md)
- Exercises: DevTools practice, quote scraper, news aggregator, Playwright automation
- Case studies: Price tracking, research monitoring, social media analysis

## Week 2: Data Validation & Labeling

**Topics**: jq, csvkit, Pydantic, Label Studio, inter-annotator agreement

### Lecture (1.5 hours)
- [PDF](week2-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](week2-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/week2-lecture.md)
- Content: Command-line tools (jq, csvkit), Pydantic validation, Label Studio, Cohen's/Fleiss' Kappa

### Lab (3 hours)
- [PDF](week2-lab.pdf) | [HTML](week2-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/week2-lab.md)
- Exercises: jq filtering, csvkit analysis, Pydantic models, Label Studio annotation
- Case studies: Research papers, e-commerce validation pipelines

## Week 3: LLM APIs & Multimodal AI

**Topics**: Gemini API, text generation, vision models, multimodal understanding

### Lecture (1.5 hours)
- [PDF](week3-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](week3-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/week3-lecture.md)
- Content: LLM API setup, text understanding (NER, sentiment, QA), vision (OCR, object detection), audio/video processing

### Lab (3 hours)
- [PDF](week3-lab.pdf) | [HTML](week3-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/week3-lab.md)
- Exercises: API setup, sentiment analysis, image analysis, OCR, PDF extraction, audio transcription
- Based on: [Gemini API Tutorial](https://nipunbatra.github.io/blog/posts/2025-12-01-gemini-api-multimodal.html)
